column4: what's the best irc program for unbuntu? I'm looking for SSL and simplicity
is xchat really availible for it?
i'm using xchat on my windows right now
thanks Blaize
or if you can't figure that out, install xchat-gnome (not quite as robust as xchat, but it'll get you on IRC)
you gotta crawl before you run a marathon
that doesn't sound good.. thats one reason i hate using the net to upgrade
what do you reccomend? I wanna finish the upgrade or at least fix my XORG... i get get into command line easily
you can try reconfiguring..
you can try sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg    just take generic defaults, see if that gets you back to a working desktop, but i wouldn't get my hopes up
thanks, i'll try it now
i got it back to the boxes...
didn't work :( gave a bunch of questions
those questions is how it reconfigures your xorg.conf
now it broke even more "ubuntu is running in low graphics mode"
but can you get to a GUI?
i thought you said it was doing that before.
did you just take generic defaults, thats what i would do.
i did that.
dunno.. but i don't see how it would have "borked it more"
am i doomed to format?
dunno.. sounds like somethign definitely went nanners when you lost your connection during the upgrade.. it would probably easiest to clean install
should i use kernel framebuffer device interface?
whats default
